content: Copper Pill is one of the Epic Soaks for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. The Soak's ability is rather specialised, useful for specific spell builds or when adopting a particular style, over some of the other Soaks, which have a more general use.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Copper_Pill.md', within the main section titled 'Copper Pill'.
The content is as follows:
Copper Pill is one of the Epic Soaks for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. The Soak's ability is rather specialised, useful for specific spell builds or when adopting a particular style, over some of the other Soaks, which have a more general use.
